title.narrative: Non-Food Items Support to the Emergency Response - Floods and Cyclone Idai in Mozambique

description.narrative: This activity (Non-Food Items Support to the Emergency Response - Floods and Cyclone Idai in Mozambique) is a component of Emergency Response to Cyclones Idai and Kenneth in Mozambique reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,134,340. This component benefits Mozambique, and works in the following sector(s): Material relief assistance and services , Emergency food assistance. , with the following implementing partners: CANADEM, Danish Refugee Council, Emirates SkyCargo, Norwegian Refugee Council, Palladium International Ltd (UK), RedR, UK - Ministry of Defence. The start date is 17-03-2019 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
